message.body: I do!!! I feel like it's more flattering and...bridal. eeee!
It's gorgeous!! How does it fit? Does it need any alterations? It's hard to tell from the pic.
Yeah, sorry, bad mirror pic. The straps need to be shortened a tiny bit, but other than that it's perfect! With my heels the front is juuust above the floor!
Amazing!! I love it, I think it's beautifuuuul!
Thank you!!!! Me tooooo! And I think it def still goes with the vibe and everything!
Oh completely! It's very romantic looking ‚ù§
The shower invites came tonight and they are so cute!
